__e: Sometimes, you need a little human contact.
Wanna talk about not getting love from a parent? You know what I used to do when I was little to have sensation of human contact?
Even if real human contact is something you don't have or even want or need, you should at least be able to see it in other people. Yeah.
We must find it in its human form.
Well, sir, a good starting point may be, why was I given human form'?
I just wanted you to know that taking Human form at this age, well necessary, didn't come easy, because of how I knew I would feel being here with you again.
Isn't it human to be this way?
Um... here's what I think. I think you are scared. And you wouldn't be human if you weren't scared in a place like this.
It's actually a very human thing to feel sad.
And so I tried to look human.
She looks almost human. How is that possible?
You can't just sprinkle a little human DNA into the Continuum and make everything all right.
You believe human DNA is going to restore peace?
There are traces of human DNA. It's them.
I've always tried to get you to be something else, something more human, and I was wrong.
I think it explores the concept of humanity, what it might be.
You're only human, and everybody does it anyway.
